text: Hameŋ 22.29 HJL 16.38 abɨci sagaŋ hɨsɨŋ hulemɨlɨ Polɨ dɨ vɨgɨlavɨla abitɨhɨben aba lɨhavɨmi agɨlaŋ lɨdavɨla nudɨ vala faca uavɨmi. Faca ua hɨniavɨdaci sagaŋ hali hɨsɨŋ agɨladɨ manɨgali agaŋ avi lɨdavɨla hɨji nameŋ lamami. Viaŋ abɨlɨŋ hulaŋ mu nudɨ ibi Lom haiabɨla hɨsɨŋ manɨgali agɨladɨ manasɨŋ hɨvɨ hɨnilalɨ agadɨ viavɨla lɨmɨn hɨvɨ ci hahavi uami.Hadi hɨlahɨla hutesɨ hutesɨ limu hɨhɨle agɨladɨ mɨŋaiahuiahu fɨli ibɨlɨ agɨladɨ vivi hɨvɨ havalavɨdaci iahuavɨmi.
